entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy roughly out of the way.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The three Death Eaters fell back without a word.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape gazed for a moment at Dumbledore, and there was revulsion and hatred etched in the harsh lines of his face.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: ‘Severus ... please ...’ Snape raised his wand and pointed it directly at Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Snape raised his wand and pointed it directly at Dumbledore. ‘Avada Kedavra!’ A jet of green light shot from the end of Snape’s wand and hit Dumbledore squarely in the chest.
